title: Cal Poly spinout sells to leading healthcare company
body: Cal Poly San Luis Obispo's startup scene has only gotten stronger over the past decade and another example of that is De Oro Devices, a company founded by students in 2018 that sold to Drive DeVilbiss Healthcare in early June for an undisclosed amount.

title: Drive DeVilbiss Healthcare acquires product line of De Oro Devices
body: Drive DeVilbiss Healthcare (DDH) has acquired the product line of De Oro Devices, the California-based company behind NexStride, a mobility aid designed to help people with Parkinson's
